page.title: 18School News.
page.content: SCHOOL NEWS. Longvernal Primary School Association's balloon race began on Thursday evening(4th July) when more than 200 balloons were realeased from the school courtyard. Over the next two weeks it is hoped the stamped balloons will gradually arrive back at the school. the furthest has travelled to Lanark in Scotland. A prize of five pounds will go to the person whos balloon has travelled the furthest by July 19th. The school sports day takes place on Wednesday 17th July and all the children are taking part. Each class has its own races and apart from the usual races the 60m sprint and the egg and spoon race there are some rather different ones. The fourth year have a chariot race (in which teams of four children combine to make a human chariot).
